mapper.select: SELECT C."jigyoshaMeisho" AS "事業者名称", C."telNo" AS "電話番号", C."faxNo" AS "FAX番号", C."yubinNo" AS "郵便番号", C."jigyoshaJusho" AS "事業者住所" FROM rgdb."DbT1003TashichosonJushochiTokurei" A, rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" B, rgdb."DbT1005KaigoJogaiTokureiTaishoShisetsu" C WHERE A."shikibetsuCode" =#{shikibetsuCode} AND A."idoYMD" =#{idoYMD} AND A."edaNo" =#{edaNo} AND A."logicalDeletedFlag" <> true AND A."shikibetsuCode" = B."shikibetsuCode" AND B."nyushoYMD" <= #{nyushoYMD} AND C."jigyoshaShubetsu" = B."nyushoShisetsuShurui" AND C."jigyoshaNo" = B."nyushoShisetsuCode" AND C."yukoKaishiYMD" <= B."taishoYMD" AND B."taishoYMD" <= C."yukoShuryoYMD" ORDER BY B."nyushoYMD" LIMIT 2

SELECT B."nyushoYMD" AS "入所年月日", C."jigyoshaMeisho" AS "事業者名称", C."telNo" AS "電話番号", C."faxNo" AS "FAX番号", C."yubinNo" AS "郵便番号", C."jigyoshaJusho" AS "事業者住所" FROM rgdb."DbT1003TashichosonJushochiTokurei" A, rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" B, rgdb."DbT1005KaigoJogaiTokureiTaishoShisetsu" C WHERE A."shikibetsuCode" =#{shikibetsuCode} AND A."idoYMD" =#{idoYMD} AND A."edaNo" =#{edaNo} AND A."logicalDeletedFlag" <> true AND A."shikibetsuCode" = B."shikibetsuCode" AND NOT( (A."tekiyoYMD" > B."nyushoYMD" AND A."tekiyoYMD" >= B."taishoYMD") AND (A."kaijoYMD" <= B."nyushoYMD" AND A."kaijoYMD" < B."taishoYMD") ) AND C."jigyoshaShubetsu" = B."nyushoShisetsuShurui" AND C."jigyoshaNo" = B."nyushoShisetsuCode" AND C."yukoKaishiYMD" <= B."taishoYMD" AND B."taishoYMD" <= C."yukoShuryoYMD"
SELECT A."kanaMeisho"AS "カナ名称", A."meisho" AS "名称", A."seinengappiYMD" AS "生年月日", A."seibetsuCode" AS "性別コード" FROM AS A

SELECT A."kanaMeisho" AS "カナ名称", A."meisho" AS "名称", A."seinengappiYMD" AS "生年月日", A."seibetsuCode" AS "性別コード", A."tennyumaeYubinNo" AS "転入前郵便番号", A."tennyumaeJusho" AS "転入前住所", A."orokuIdoYMD" AS "登録異動年月日" FROM AS A
